widgets.name: Cloud Accounts
widgets.text: This widget displays a list of all cloud accounts linked to the organization.

widgets.name: Cloud Account Risk Assessment
widgets.text: This widget provides an assessment of risks associated with each cloud account

widgets.name: Workload Security Status
widgets.text: Provides a real-time overview of the security status of all workloads across cloud environments, identifying any at-risk workloads.

widgets.name: Vulnerability Scan Results
widgets.text: Displays the results of the latest vulnerability scans, highlighting critical vulnerabilities that need immediate attention.

widgets.name: Image Risk Assessment
widgets.text: Displays a risk assessment for container images based on identified vulnerabilities, with scores or ratings indicating the overall risk level of each image

widgets.name: Image Security Issues
widgets.text: Lists detected security issues within container images, including specific vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and other security flaws.

widgets.name: User Activity Monitoring
widgets.text: Tracks user activities in the cloud environment, highlighting any suspicious or unauthorized actions.

widgets.name: IAM Policy Violations
widgets.text: Lists detected violations of IAM policies, such as unauthorized role assignments or access to sensitive resources.
